caption.p:
Influence of the grain size on the conductivity at the detonation of RDX, HMX and PETN of powder density: ( a) maximum conductivity σ
max vs. the duration of the high conductivity zone τ, ( b) function of the product of dependent quantities Φ = σ
max ⋅ τ vs. density of HE. Here, < d> is the average grain size in μm, ρ is the density in g/cm 3. Arrow shows the direction of the shift of experimental data for smaller grain size.
